title: 14-Day Suspension
body:
I don't understand what of my words was " far below the standards " & makes me deserve a 2-week ban. Most of the time I'm seen as a player who is trying to communicate with his team. The rest of my chat was nothing more than typical Ranked frustration when you're playing with teammates who int feed or somebody like my jungler who liked calling others by the N word. Excuse me but how is this justified?

                                           Game 1
Raîon: there's a nice path for a quicker level 4
Raîon: but pull raptors
Raîon: XD
Raîon: thank u very much
Raîon: so basically rap - red - wolves - blue - gromp and im 4
Raîon: like your d
Raîon: xD
Raîon: basically?
Raîon: nice
Raîon: ;)
Raîon: this is my invention
Raîon: jk foxdrop op
Raîon: then u should know how to def and ward?
Raîon: top mid f
Raîon: wp
Raîon: cant come top
Raîon: ??? xD
Raîon: stfu
Raîon: stfu
Raîon: what are u silver
Raîon: ye stfu
Raîon: xD
Raîon: ure on the ground
Raîon: how am I low
Raîon: wp rumb
Raîon: LOL
Raîon: bunch of shitterz on bot lane dude
Raîon: I never saw that
Raîon: sucks dude
Raîon: cait flames ints
Raîon: DAS
Raîon: SDAS
Raîon: SAD
Raîon: ASd
Raîon: ASd
Raîon: asd
Raîon: Dsa
Raîon: AD
Raîon: ASd
Raîon: ASd
Raîon: asDa
Raîon: DsA
Raîon: ASd
Raîon: AS
Raîon: fuck this
Raîon: I think we can win
Raîon: but
Raîon: focus
Raîon: janna
Raîon: please help cait
Raîon: I know how u feel but
Raîon: its one game
Raîon: ff
Raîon: Janna is trash
Raîon: hes playing like a goldie
Raîon: 0 wards just facechecking and getting caught
Raîon: is this silver?
Raîon: idk dude this botlane is totally gold elo
Raîon: trash af
Raîon: bg 
                                          Game 2
Raîon: starting raptors
Raîon: ?
Raîon: oh
Raîon: if a lane is winning play safer on the other lanes
Raîon: XD
Raîon: nah
Raîon: I was too confident I guess
Raîon: sry guys.
Raîon: :)
Raîon: top in 1 minute
Raîon: dunno...
Raîon: I think yea
Raîon: I wanna help Riven too..
Raîon: from lane
Raîon: VI COMING
Raîon: MY BAD
Raîon: at least I counterganked
Raîon: instead of talking just ward dra
Raîon: report this kid
Raîon: im done
Raîon: he just used the n word lol
Raîon: we dont know that
Raîon: 95% hes a toxic eune kiddo
Raîon: actually 100 but w/e
Raîon: jhin f
Raîon: yup report this lee sin
Raîon: ...
Raîon: hehe
Raîon: I sure did
Raîon: ah wp
Raîon: naisu
Raîon: ..
Raîon: that double flash
Raîon: rofl
Raîon: why not?
Raîon: its 4v5 anyway
Raîon: lol
Raîon: LOL
Raîon: we just need to ff
Raîon: we would win but 2 of them flashed
Raîon: wed be fine vi jhin flashed
Raîon: u suk
Raîon: LOOOL
Raîon: as much as vi did
Raîon: 0
Raîon: Ez

replies.body:
Well, if this is truly all and you never had a CR before, then i'd recommend writhing the support.
Your attempts to persuade us that you are telling the truth are meaningless.
Even if we believe you, it doesn't matter at all.
You got a few people agreeing that this doesn't warrant an instant 14-day ban if youve never been penalized before, so if your story is true, write the support.
We cannot judge wether or not it is true, and there are a lot of people that make stuff up.

> [{quoted}](name=Cantabrum,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-07-15T11:03:03.896+0000)
>
> Well, if this is truly all and you never had a CR before, then i'd recommend writhing the support.
> Your attempts to persuade us that you are telling the truth are meaningless.
> Even if we believe you, it doesn't matter at all.
> You got a few people agreeing that this doesn't warrant an instant 14-day ban if youve never been penalized before, so if your story is true, write the support.
> We cannot judge wether or not it is true, and there are a lot of people that make stuff up.

Yeah I understand bro, and I went to Riot Support and submitted a ticket... Though I'm quite unconfident about my ban getting lifted and instead being replaced with a chat restriction...

> [{quoted}](name=Raîon,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-07-15T11:13:38.839+0000)
>
> Yeah I understand bro, and I went to Riot Support and submitted a ticket... Though I'm quite unconfident about my ban getting lifted and instead being replaced with a chat restriction...

First answers might be automatic, since that's suffiecient for most requests...
if that happens, just write again.
Its not uncommon for Riot to unban people if there was a mistake, the mistake itself is very uncommon.
IMO it doesn't look like it deserves a 14 day ban... But if you were banned recently before it would explain why.

> [{quoted}](name=Lucyfür,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-15T08:43:37.382+0000)
>
> IMO it doesn't look like it deserves a 14 day ban... But if you were banned recently before it would explain why.

Never before.

> [{quoted}](name=Raîon,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T08:44:07.471+0000)
>
> Never before.

Post other 2 games :)

Also did u have 25 game chat restriction before?

> [{quoted}](name=archerno1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T08:46:10.501+0000)
>
> Post other 2 games :)
> 
> Also did u have 25 game chat restriction before?

Never before. These were the games I was banned for.

> [{quoted}](name=Raîon,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T09:15:52.711+0000)
>
> Never before. These were the games I was banned for.

There has to be game 3

> [{quoted}](name=archerno1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T09:24:25.764+0000)
>
> There has to be game 3

There is NOT. What do you mean there has to be?

> [{quoted}](name=Raîon,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T09:25:28.040+0000)
>
> There is NOT. What do you mean there has to be?

Well these chat logs are toxic and enough to warant punishment. But not enough to give immediate 14 days ban (thats usually reserved for hate speec, encouraging suicide, threats and stuff like that). And if u didnt have chat restrictions in the past, that means 2 things: Either you edited these chat logs to remove things that escalated u to 14 days ban (which is pointless as Riot wouldnt look at forum logs to check if your ban is correct, but would look at actual chat logs that thye have) or there is third game which u refused to show (which again is pointless cause Riot also have chat logs from that and they would look at it to see why it was 14 days ban). 

Overall:

-Either you hid 3rd game
-Either you edited your chat logs
-Either you had 25 games chat restriction before this punishment

> [{quoted}](name=archerno1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T09:28:21.793+0000)
>
> Well these chat logs are toxic and enough to warant punishment. But not enough to give immediate 14 days ban (thats usually reserved for hate speec, encouraging suicide, threats and stuff like that). And if u didnt have chat restrictions in the past, that means 2 things: Either you edited these chat logs to remove things that escalated u to 14 days ban (which is pointless as Riot wouldnt look at forum logs to check if your ban is correct, but would look at actual chat logs that thye have) or there is third game which u refused to show (which again is pointless cause Riot also have chat logs from that and they would look at it to see why it was 14 days ban). 
> 
> Overall:
> 
> -Either you hid 3rd game
> -Either you edited your chat logs
> -Either you had 25 games chat restriction before this punishment

NONE OF THESE, FOR GOD'S SAKE. THIS IS WHY I CAME TO THE FORUMS. Help me out PLEASE.

> [{quoted}](name=Raîon,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T09:57:59.993+0000)
>
> NONE OF THESE, FOR GOD'S SAKE. THIS IS WHY I CAME TO THE FORUMS. Help me out PLEASE.

There is one more option. Something you said in pregame or post game lobby in one of these 2 games. Thats not included in chat log sent to player but can influence punishment as system has access to those.

> [{quoted}](name=archerno1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T10:01:37.334+0000)
>
> There is one more option. Something you said in pregame or post game lobby in one of these 2 games. Thats not included in chat log sent to player but can influence punishment as system has access to those.

None of that either... I'm getting dissapointed. Remember Gripex getting banned for inting with his KD being 0/1? Seems as unfair as this one.

> [{quoted}](name=Raîon,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T10:04:51.010+0000)
>
> None of that either... I'm getting dissapointed. Remember Gripex getting banned for inting with his KD being 0/1? Seems as unfair as this one.

Except Gripex was innocent. You deserve punishment, thats not debatable. You were toxic and punishment was deserved. Thing that confuses me is , why its 14 days instead of chat restriction.
I seem to remember someone who got escalated for spam with similar logs. I could be wrong though.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-15T11:20:07.190+0000)
>
> I seem to remember someone who got escalated for spam with similar logs. I could be wrong though.

Im sure he said something in post game lobby considering how toxic he was in game. He just either dont remember cause he was so angry, or he just dont want to admit it.
I wasn't reacting to anyone, rather... "raging" myself.

God you talk say to much.  You should try muting everyone instead of typing and not playing.  You must be really annoying to play with cuz ik if i played with you, i wouldnt even want to try to win the game....

Definitely deserve the ban.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCrackerr85,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=VziX9xm4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-15T08:57:13.576+0000)
>
> God you talk say to much.  You should try muting everyone instead of typing and not playing.  You must be really annoying to play with cuz ik if i played with you, i wouldnt even want to try to win the game....
> 
> Definitely deserve the ban.

In that case you can mute me, that's why there's a chat in the first place. You can't ban me for talking too much. Lol

> In that case you can mute me,

Apparently, it seemed to be a difficult task for you.
